T02TD1224E:26b-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1224E:26b-5: dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' thugs brtse ba la phyag 'tshal nas //
T02TD1224E:27a-0: yang dag bde ba ma lus dngos grub rab ster @27a * //
T02TD1224E:27a-2: dpal ldan gsang ba'i rgyud sogs las gsungs shin tu sbas pa nyid //
T02TD1224E:27a-3: mdor bsdus mdzes pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga bshad par bya //
T02TD1224E:27a-4: sngags pas nub mo khyad par can dus nyi ma re re yi ni ji snyed par //
T02TD1224E:27a-5: zla ba re re yang ni 'khor lo las 'das nyams par 'gyur ba yin //
T02TD1224E:27a-6: nye bar 'tshe ba med pa'i dur khrod dgon pa'i rdzing bu'i 'gram mam skyed mos tshal //
T02TD1224E:27a-7: mtsho ngogs chu klung ri sul rang gi khyim sogs 'bras bu ster ba'i 'khor lo bya //
T02TD1224E:27a-8: yang dag brgyud pa thob 'gyur la //
T02TD1224E:27a-9: dpal ldan chog shes snying rje ldan //
T02TD1224E:27a-10: 'jig rten chos la mi chags shing //
T02TD1224E:27a-11: sred dang rgyu sogs rnam par spangs //
T02TD1224E:27a-12: snyan par smra zhing 'dzum pa'i bzhin //
T02TD1224E:27a-13: bzod can brtan dang brtson 'grus ldan //
T02TD1224E:27a-14: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i gtso bo ru //
T02TD1224E:27a-15: dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' gsungs //
T02TD1224E:27a-16: 'khor lo yang dag de nyid kyis //
T02TD1224E:27a-17: slob ma sred sogs rnam par spangs //
T02TD1224E:27a-18: dbang bskur thob cing blo ldan bzod //
T02TD1224E:27a-19: brtson dang dran pa la sogs ldan //
T02TD1224E:27a-20: dam tshig spyad bya spyod pa rnams //
T02TD1224E:27a-21: rgan pa'i rim pa bzhin du 'dod //
T02TD1224E:27a-22: dbang ma thob pas mi rig par //
T02TD1224E:27a-24: me tog bdug pa byug pa mar me ldan //
T02TD1224E:27a-25: sna tshogs ston mo btung bas rnam brgyan cing //
T02TD1224E:27a-26: mal stan dang ni yon tan bcas pa yis //
T02TD1224E:27a-27: 'phags pa'i skye bo mang po'am ni tshogs pa la'o //
T02TD1224E:27a-28: de nas tshogs kyi gtso bo'i gdan //
T02TD1224E:27a-29: ro'am stag lpags ro shun las bya'o //
T02TD1224E:27a-30: rgyan ni 'dam bag gis bya ba'o //
T02TD1224E:27a-31: phyi rol med pa'i phyag rgyas 'khyud //
T02TD1224E:27a-32: rang gi slob mas yongs su bskor //
T02TD1224E:27a-33: des kyang rang rig ma la 'khyud //
T02TD1224E:27a-34: mi nus bsam gtan dag gis bya //
T02TD1224E:27a-35: slob ma cho ga shes shing dran //
T02TD1224E:27a-36: brtson 'grus bzod dang ldan pa dang //
T02TD1224E:27a-37: bla ma la gus blo ldan pa //
T02TD1224E:27a-38: las kyi rdo rje rab tu bya //
T02TD1224E:27a-39: dbang bskur yang ni gdug can dang //
T02TD1224E:27a-40: thob dang rgyun can dag dang ni //
T02TD1224E:27a-41: dbang ma thob par 'khor lo gang //
T02TD1224E:27a-42: ring po nas kyang bstan mi bya //
T02TD1224E:27a-43: bla mas bde chen bsgom byas nas //
T02TD1224E:27a-44: 'byung po kun la gtor ma sbyin //
T02TD1224E:27a-45: stobs la sogs pa sbyang byas la //
T02TD1224E:27a-46: me tog gis ni rang lus mchod //
T02TD1224E:27b-0: @27b snod ni re re kun la sbyin //
T02TD1224E:27b-1: bla ma la ni snod gnyis dbul //
T02TD1224E:27b-2: de bzhin nas mtshan bza' btung la sogs gnyis 'gyur ro //
T02TD1224E:27b-3: de nas rang zhal thab khung du //
T02TD1224E:27b-4: rnam rig s'a la'i mchod yon bya //
T02TD1224E:27b-5: lag pa dag ni dgang gzar gyis //
T02TD1224E:27b-6: yid kyis me la stobs sogs bsreg / nang gi bdag nyid sbyin sreg gis //
T02TD1224E:27b-7: rang 'dod lha ni tshim par bya //
T02TD1224E:27b-8: glu sogs kyis ni mnyes bya zhing //
T02TD1224E:27b-9: yang dang yang du brda tshig smra //
T02TD1224E:27b-10: bdud rtsi lnga dang sgron ma lnga //
T02TD1224E:27b-11: rig ma rigs bzang brgyad la ni //
T02TD1224E:27b-12: cho ga bzhin du bsten shes bya //
T02TD1224E:27b-13: ko la la sogs ci shes dang //
T02TD1224E:27b-14: he ru ka yi gzugs kyis gar //
T02TD1224E:27b-15: dran pas brjed med rnal 'byor bya //
T02TD1224E:27b-16: sgom la chags pa'i sems kyis ni //
T02TD1224E:27b-17: rtag tu sems kyis goms par bya //
T02TD1224E:27b-18: rdo rje chos dang sangs rgyas kyi //
T02TD1224E:27b-19: rnal 'byor ma dang ma tshogs kyang //
T02TD1224E:27b-20: glu dang gar la goms bya zhing //
T02TD1224E:27b-21: mchog tu glu dang gar bya'o //
T02TD1224E:27b-22: 'di nyid tshogs kyi bsrung ba ste //
T02TD1224E:27b-23: bdag nyid kyang ni de bzhin bsrung //
T02TD1224E:27b-25: sngags kyi bzlas pa'i de nyid yin //
T02TD1224E:27b-26: rgyun du glu ni len pa dang //
T02TD1224E:27b-27: gang du rtag tu gar byed pa //
T02TD1224E:27b-28: tshogs kyi gtso bo mdun byas nas //
T02TD1224E:27b-29: de nas dri ni mtshon par bya //
T02TD1224E:27b-30: sgog pa'i dri ni dang po ste//
T02TD1224E:27b-31: de nas bya rgod dri yang ngo //
T02TD1224E:27b-32: de nas ga pur tsandan dri //
T02TD1224E:27b-33: glu yi dbyings su mtshon bya ba //
T02TD1224E:27b-34: sgra ni ngang pa bung ba'i sgra //
T02TD1224E:27b-35: sgra yi mtha' ru thos pa dang //
T02TD1224E:27b-36: ce spyang dag gi sgra yang ni //
T02TD1224E:27b-37: phyi rol skyed mos tshal du mtshon //
T02TD1224E:27b-38: gang yang dag ni mi rnyed pa'am //
T02TD1224E:27b-39: snod ma yin pas 'jigs pa spangs //
T02TD1224E:27b-40: bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga sogs //
T02TD1224E:27b-41: bsam gtan gyis ni yongs su brtag /'khor lo'i gtso bos byin brlabs pa //
T02TD1224E:27b-42: snod skyon rjes su gzung bya'i phyir //
T02TD1224E:27b-43: bdud dang bcas pas snod de ni //
T02TD1224E:27b-44: ha cang myur min bul ba min //
T02TD1224E:27b-45: bgegs sogs brnyas pa spang ba'i phyir //
T02TD1224E:27b-46: padma'i phyag rgyas blang bar bya //
T02TD1224E:27b-47: hub sgra med cing ma yengs pas //
T02TD1224E:27b-48: cung zad 'thungs nas legs bkang ste //
T02TD1224E:27b-49: phyag 'tshal ba yi khyad par gyis //
T02TD1224E:27b-50: gang gi phyag rgyas dbul bar bya //
T02TD1224E:27b-51: sgrub pa po yis yang dang yang //
T02TD1224E:27b-52: de dag kun la phyag bya'o //
T02TD1224E:27b-53: snod ni sa la bzhag pa'am //
T02TD1224E:28a-2: lag na sa bon chad pas bcad //
T02TD1224E:28a-3: rang gis thams cad mi btung ngo //
T02TD1224E:28a-4: bza' dang btung ba rang gis ni //
T02TD1224E:28a-5: shin tu ltogs kyang blang mi bya //
T02TD1224E:28a-6: rtsod pa la sogs gang byed pa //
T02TD1224E:28a-7: de nas de ni gdon par bya //
T02TD1224E:28a-8: yang na gdon par mi nus na //
T02TD1224E:28a-9: de tshe sdig pa la btags pas //
T02TD1224E:28a-11: mi smra ba la bstan par bya //
T02TD1224E:28a-12: las kyi rdo rje btung sogs la //
T02TD1224E:28a-13: rang gis blangs kyang nyes pa med //
T02TD1224E:28a-14: spyod lam shugs kyis phyir 'gro na //
T02TD1224E:28a-15: de ni dgag par mi bya'o //
T02TD1224E:28a-16: mngon pa'i nga rgyal zhe sdang gis //
T02TD1224E:28a-17: gzhan smod dam pa ma yin pa'i //
T02TD1224E:28a-18: tshig gis smad kyang rtsod pa'i gtam //
T02TD1224E:28a-19: mi dga' ba yang spang bar bya //
T02TD1224E:28a-20: bkag pa yang ni spyod gyur na //
T02TD1224E:28a-21: rtsa ba'i ltung dang sbom po ni //
T02TD1224E:28a-22: myur du gso ba'i cho ga bya //
T02TD1224E:28a-23: de ni ldang ba'i cho ga grags //
T02TD1224E:28a-24: rdo rje slob dpon tshim gyur pas //
T02TD1224E:28a-25: bar du gtor ma sbyin par bya //
T02TD1224E:28a-26: glu dang gar la sogs rgyun ni //
T02TD1224E:28a-27: de yi bka' yis gnang bar bya //
T02TD1224E:28a-28: tshogs kyis 'dus pa la bya ba //
T02TD1224E:28a-29: lag pa rkang sogs bag ldan bya //
T02TD1224E:28a-30: shin tu bag med rgyu yi phyir //
T02TD1224E:28a-31: btung ba mang po spyad mi bya //
T02TD1224E:28a-32: mang dag gis ni g-yeng bar 'gyur //
T02TD1224E:28a-34: rnal 'byor nyams pas dngos grub med //
T02TD1224E:28a-35: bdud kyi las ni bzlog par dka' //
T02TD1224E:28a-36: gang yang sems ni bsrung nus pas //
T02TD1224E:28a-37: rang dam gzhan yang mchod par bya //
T02TD1224E:28a-38: gzugs sogs sna tshogs dag pa yis //
T02TD1224E:28a-40: skad cig tsam yang gzhan gzugs kyis //
T02TD1224E:28a-41: ma rig gdug can gyi ni sems //
T02TD1224E:28a-42: grub 'dod dngos grub don gnyer ba'i //
T02TD1224E:28a-43: 'bad pas mkhas pas gnas mi bya //
T02TD1224E:28a-44: ji snyed lus kyi g-yo 'gul dang //
T02TD1224E:28a-45: ngag gi brjod pa ji snyed pa //
T02TD1224E:28a-46: de snyed sngags dang phyag rgya ste //
T02TD1224E:28a-47: he ru ka dpal go 'phang gnas //
T02TD1224E:28a-48: gang gis dug gi dum bu yi //
T02TD1224E:28a-50: dug gi de nyid shes pa yis //
T02TD1224E:28a-51: dug gis dug ni 'joms par byed //
T02TD1224E:28a-52: kha cig brel pa gzhan yod pas //
T02TD1224E:28a-53: yun ring 'dug par mi nus na //
T02TD1224E:28a-54: de yis phyag 'tshal mkhyen gsol te //
T02TD1224E:28a-55: bzod gsol nas ni 'gro bar bya //
T02TD1224E:28a-56: 'di dang gzhan gyi rgyud gsungs pa'i //
T02TD1224E:28b-0: @28b bya ba rnams ni dal la bya //
T02TD1224E:28b-1: gang phyir myur du byas pa yis //
T02TD1224E:28b-2: rnal 'byor pa yi dga' nyams byed //
T02TD1224E:28b-3: de ltar tshogs kyi 'khor lo cher //
T02TD1224E:28b-4: rang gi slob ma dbang bskur phyir //
T02TD1224E:28b-5: sgom pa la sogs stobs nyid kyis //
T02TD1224E:28b-7: sgom pa la sogs de bzhin 'dir//
T02TD1224E:28b-8: yang ni bka' gsal byed pas kyang //
T02TD1224E:28b-9: gal te ltung ba med gyur na //
T02TD1224E:28b-10: skye ba bcu drug dag la 'grub //
T02TD1224E:28b-11: bla mas tha ma'i gtor mi sbyin //
T02TD1224E:28b-12: de bzhin phyi rol lhag gtor ma //
T02TD1224E:28b-13: sgrub pa po yis phyag 'tshal zhing //
T02TD1224E:28b-14: smon lam dag ni ji ltar gdab //
T02TD1224E:28b-15: ma lus rtog pa las 'das srid dang zhi ba mnyam sbyor rtag tu mi 'gyur ba //
T02TD1224E:28b-16: dpe med bde bar ro yis dgyes pa'i rnal 'byor ma yi mchog la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1224E:28b-17: rdo rje yan lag ma dang sbyar ba yi //
T02TD1224E:28b-18: rtog pa'i phung po yongs su bcom gyur pa //
T02TD1224E:28b-19: bdag gi dge ba 'di yis de yi thabs //
T02TD1224E:28b-20: myur ba nyid du ston par byed par shog /
T02TD1224E:28b-21: dngos po kun gyis phyag byas nas //
T02TD1224E:28b-22: dpal ldan tshogs kyi 'khor lo bsdus //
T02TD1224E:28b-23: ci bde bas ni gnas par bya //
T02TD1224E:28b-24: 'di ni bla ma'i rim thob pa'i //
T02TD1224E:28b-25: bdag nyid dran par bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD1224E:28b-26: cho ga cung zad brjod pa la //
T02TD1224E:28b-27: mkhas pa rnams ni bzod par mdzod //
T02TD1224E:28b-28: dngos grub kun gyi rten gyur yon tan sngon 'gro tshogs kyi 'khor lo yi //
T02TD1224E:28b-29: cho ga gsal por bris pa'i bsod nams bdag gis gang thob des /
T02TD1224E:28b-30: myur du dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang yul skal bzang la chags shing /
T02TD1224E:28b-31: srid pa las grol zhi ba'i phyag rgya chen po thob par shog / dam tshig lnga pa zhes bya ba slob dpon dpal padma 'byung gnas zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1224E:28b-33: // / dpal rigs pa'i 'byung gnas kra ma sh'i li'i gtsug lag khang du khams pa lo ts'a ba ba ri dharma k'irtis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o //
